name: World War Woomy
description:
A small top-down shooter themed after Splatoon. 

It is endless, with the main objective of defeating the final boss after a few waves. There's one powerup which increases your attack speed and gives you lives after maxing out. Your number of lives is in the top left corner. Enjoy! C:

I made this game while in school as part of learning to make games!

Art is not mine, it belongs to their respective owners. 

Controls: 
Arrow keys: Move
Space: Shoot
